Returns: a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ServerAuthCodeCallbacks#CheckResult_E@ object that can be used as return value for @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ServerAuthCodeCallbacks#onCheckServerAuthorization_E@ callback.
Parameters: the scope set which server requires for offline access.
Throws: if a null or empty set is passed in for the requiredScopes parameter
newAuthRequiredResult(java.util.Set<com..Description: Creates a CheckResult object indicating further auth is needed, i.e. server needs a (new) auth code to exchange for a (new) refresh token.

Returns: a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ServerAuthCodeCallbacks#CheckResult_E@ object that can be used as return value for @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ServerAuthCodeCallbacks#onCheckServerAuthorization_E@ callback.
newAuthNotRequiredResult().Description: Creates a CheckResult object indicating no further auth is needed, i.e. server doesn't need a (new) auth code to exchange for a (new) refresh token.

ClassDesc: The result holder for @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient#ServerAuthCodeCallbacks#onCheckServerAuthorization_E@ which contains below information: Whether the server needs a server auth code to exchange for a refresh token. What scopes the server requires if it needs a new refresh token.
